name: Mozilla Firefox
descriprion: Mozilla Firefox is a secure browser with a rich ecosystem of extensions, known for its speed and advanced privacy protection tools.

name: Google Chrome
descriprion: Google Chrome offers high speed, excellent integration with Google services, and an intuitive interface, making it a popular choice among users.

name: Microsoft Edge
descriprion: Microsoft Edge browser provides smooth performance, integrated security tools, and productivity enhancements, supporting users in their tasks and workflows.
